UNUSED notice: If you are translating this program please put your username on translation-author above, this message will not be seen inside PitCrew.

about.title: About
about.description: A mod loader for The Crew 1
about.author: By: FTIW
filelist.priority-blank: You cannot set the priority to blank, delete the path to remove the list item.
filelist.priority-requires-number: The priority has to be a number.
filelist.priority-no-edit-before-path: You cannot edit the priority before the path.
conflictbox.default:
Add your game inside the Instances tab.
Double click the game in the list to select it.
conflictbox.no-mods:
Add your mods by dragging and dropping the zip files into the blue highlighted box.
Or by clicking Mods -> Import
conflictbox.no-conflicts: Remember to click Compile to apply your mods to the game.
modlist.packagemod.no-metadata:
Could not find proper metadata.
Please edit this mod.
modlist.packagemod.success:
Mod packaged for sharing at {0}.zip
View in explorer?
modlist.deletemod-warning:
Are you sure you want to delete this?
The metadata and all mod files will be gone.
importmod.filechooser.title: Please Select an .mdata or zip file
importmod.overwrite-old-mod:
A mod with this ID already exists.
Overwrite?
importmod.file-in-use: Another mod is currently using a file with the name {0}. Please rename the file for this mod aswell in the metadata.
